text:
Addison Rae Easterling (born October 6, 2000), commonly known as Addison Rae, is an American social media personality and dancer. She has more than 4 billion likes and more than 70 million followers on TikTok, making her the second most-followed person on TikTok.
Early life.
Addison Rae Easterling was born on October 6, 2000, in Lafayette, Louisiana, to Monty Lopez and Sheri Easterling. She also has two brothers, who are named Enzo and Lucus. She grew up in Lafayette, Louisiana. Before she moved to Los Angeles to have a career performing for TikTok, she went to Calvary Baptist Academy in Shreveport, Louisiana.
Career.
She joined TikTok in July 2019. She has been part of the TikTok collaborative group The Hype House since December 2019, when it was founded.
In January 2020, Easterling and her parents signed with talent agency WME.
